medical_history.chief_complaint: Dull pain in the periumbilical region that progressed to the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced a dull pain in the periumbilical region starting yesterday morning, which did not radiate or improve with bowel movement. The pain shifted to the right lower quadrant by last night and intensified, becoming exquisitely tender and sharp. He reported a temperature of 100 degrees and did not find relief from Percocet. He experienced sweating overnight and continued pain the next morning, leading him to visit an Urgent Care clinic.
